data.author: Mikio Braun
data.title: Tools for people
data.content: Considering the complementary-but not all-encompassing—role tooling can play in the planning process.

data.author: Romello Goodman
data.title: Planning for pause
data.content: As a companion to agile development practices, milestones offer a meditative—and productive—opportunity to decelerate.

data.author: Safia Abdalla
data.title: Open-source excursions: The poetry of planning
data.content: Reflections on the value of a planning process that emphasizes transparency, empathy, and the people behind the products.
